keywords: TfL,Tickets, Oyster, buy tickets, buy Oyster card, buy Oyster
description: Buy tickets and Oyster cards online and from many places across London.

breadcrumbs.title: How to pay and where to buy tickets and Oyster

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can buy tickets and Oyster cards online and from places across London."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Oyster"}
You can get an Oyster card :

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Online with a \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/contactless-and-oyster-account\"\u003econtactless and Oyster account\u003c/a\u003e , if you live in the UK","At \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps/oyster-ticket-stops\"\u003eOyster Ticket Stops\u003c/a\u003e in many newsagents in London","At all Tube, London Overground and TfL Rail stations","Some DLR and National Rail stations","At \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/getting-around-london/visitor-centres\"\u003eVisitor Centres\u003c/a\u003e ","At the Tramlink Shop in Croydon"]}
You need to pay a £5 deposit for an Oyster card.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Buying multiple Oyster cards"}
If you're buying more than ten Oyster cards, call 0343 222 1234 ( call charges may apply ).
You'll receive an invoice for payment and once made, all cards are delivered to one address.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Topping up pay as you go credit"}
Top up your Oyster card:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Online with a \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/contactless-and-oyster-account\"\u003econtactless and Oyster account\u003c/a\u003e , if you live in the UK","Using the free \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/tfl-oyster-and-contactless-app\"\u003eTfL Oyster and contactless app\u003c/a\u003e ","At \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps/oyster-ticket-stops\"\u003eOyster Ticket Stops\u003c/a\u003e in many newsagents in London","At ticket machines at all Tube, London Overground and TfL Rail stations","At some DLR and National Rail stations","At London Overground, TfL Rail and some National Rail ticket offices","At \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/getting-around-london/visitor-centres\"\u003eVisitor Centres\u003c/a\u003e ","At the Tramlink Shop in Croydon","At Emirates Air Line terminals"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Bus \u0026 Tram Pass"}
You can buy a Bus & Tram Pass :

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Online with a \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/contactless-and-oyster-account\"\u003econtactless and Oyster account\u003c/a\u003e , if you have a UK bank account (7 Day, Monthly and Annual Passes)","Using the free \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/tfl-oyster-and-contactless-app\"\u003eTfL Oyster and contactless app\u003c/a\u003e (7 Day, Monthly and Annual Passes)","At \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps/oyster-ticket-stops\"\u003eOyster Ticket Stops\u003c/a\u003e in many newsagents in London (One Day, 7 Day and Monthly Passes)","London Overground and TfL Rail ticket offices (One Day paper ticket)","From ticket machines at Tube, London Overground and TfL Rail stations (One Day paper ticket, 7 Day and Monthly)","At \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/getting-around-london/visitor-centres\"\u003eVisitor Centres\u003c/a\u003e (One Day paper ticket, 7 Day, Monthly and Annual Passes)"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Single and return tickets"}
You can buy paper tickets for single and return journeys on Tube, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail services:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["From ticket machines at Tube, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail stations","From ticket offices at London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail stations"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Travelcards"}
You can buy Day Travelcards (paper ticket):

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["From ticket machines at Tube, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail stations","From ticket offices at London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail stations","At \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/getting-around-london/visitor-centres\"\u003eVisitor Centres\u003c/a\u003e ","At the Tramlink Shop in Croydon"]}
You can buy Travelcards on Oyster:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Online with a \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/contactless-and-oyster-account\"\u003econtactless and Oyster account\u003c/a\u003e , if you have a UK bank account (7 Day, Monthly, 3 month, 6 month or odd period and Annual Travelcard)","Using the free \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/tfl-oyster-and-contactless-app\"\u003eTfL Oyster and contactless app\u003c/a\u003e (7 Day, Monthly and 3 or 6 month and Annual Travelcard)","At \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps/oyster-ticket-stops\"\u003eOyster Ticket Stops\u003c/a\u003e in many newsagents in London (7 Day and Monthly Travelcards)","At ticket offices at London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail stations (7 Day, Monthly, 3 month, 6 month or odd period and Annual Travelcard)","At ticket machines at Tube, London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail stations (7 Day or Monthly Travelcard)","At \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/getting-around-london/visitor-centres\"\u003eVisitor Centres\u003c/a\u003e (7 Day, Monthly, 3 month, 6 month or odd period Travelcard)"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Register your card"}
Create a contactless and Oyster account and add your card to it. If you don't and you lose your card or it gets stolen, you can't get a refund or replacement.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Tickets for visitors"}
You buy a Visitor Oyster card to pay as you go or a Travelcard (paper ticket) in advance, from:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"https://visitorshop.tfl.gov.uk/tfl/london-travelcard/\"\u003eVisitor Shop\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/buying-tickets-and-oyster/buying-tickets-from-abroad\"\u003eBuying tickets from abroad\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://www.visitbritainshop.com/world/\"\u003eVisitBritain\u003c/a\u003e ","Gatwick Airport - Information Centre, Gatwick Express ticket office, terminal desks and the Southern Railways ticket office","Stansted Airport - Information Centre, Stansted Express ticket office and the National Express coaches ticket office","On board Eurostar trains to London"," \u003ca href=\"https://www.superbreak.com/visit-london\"\u003eSuperbreak\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://www.londonpass.com/\"\u003eThe London Pass\u003c/a\u003e "]}
You can buy a 2 Day or 3 Day Visitor Pass at some Tube stations and all Visitor Centres in London.
